committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the development of a national policy on obsolete job skills.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should: (1) in conjunction with the Departments of Labor and of Education, private industry, labor organizations, and others develop a national education and training policy for future occupational changes brought about by advances in technology; and (2) within one year, submit a comprehensive report to the Congress containing recommendations.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the development of a national policy on obsolete job skills.
